text: Lucjan Antoni Brychczy (13 June 1934 â€“ 2 December 2024), nicknamed Kici, was a Polish footballer and manager. Brychczy was born in Nowy Bytom, Poland. His career began in the 1940s and he retired from playing in 1972. Brychczy was known for playing with Legia Warsaw from 1954 to 1972, making nearly 370 appearances with them. He also managed Legia Warsaw during different periods between 1972 to 1990. Brychczy also played for the Poland national football team from 1954 to 1969, making fifty-eight appearances. Brychczy was born in Nowy Bytom, Poland. Brychczy died on 2 December 2024 in Warsaw, Poland at the age of 90. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Polish footballers Category:Polish football managers
title: Lucjan Brychczy
